Field.tooltip: Delay in seconds to superCharge detection, multiple images seconds apart
Field.Label: SuperCharge Detection Seconds Apart (secs)

The above setting SuperCharges Detection, use cautiously depending on Cameras enabled. When Enabled - will pull further images following motion for checking. Number of images, and time these images are apart are above. eg. 10 images a second apart - the plugin once motion detected will send the alert image, and then 10 new images a second apart to DeepQuest for processing.
This can very quickly mean a lot of images, depending on processing time, number of cameras enabled.

Field.tooltip: Seconds to wait before aborting image checking
Field.Label: Time to allow before Aborting Image seconds

The above setting is the time between image taken and image being processed that is allowed to pass before, skipping, aborting, deleting image Defaults to 60 seconds eg. if Image processing 60 seconds behind image capture will abort until catches up Velocity also is considered, if time processing improving >5 seconds each image will continue. Will not abort. If delay is half this time, the plugin will start discarding every 2nd supercharge image

Field.tooltip: Overiding Confidence level to ignore everthing under this level
Field.Label: Main Confidence Level 0-1 eg. 0.7
The above setting sets confidence level for everything. Nothing below this level will be saved/triggered or acted on. Can change this with Action for Day/Night differences

Field.tooltip: Scale of BI image downloaded
Field.Label: Main Image Scale 1-100
The above setting sets image scale to use for DeepState Uses BlueIris to scale image as per setting above Default 100%
